kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

test.name: TC_1: Upload records of working class hero using CSV

kw.name: Navigate to Oppenheimer Project
kw.doc: Navigate to the Oppenheimer Project page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Upload File
kw.doc: Pass xpath(xpath should be related to input tag not button) and path of file

kw.name: Normalize Path
kw.doc: Normalizes the given path.

kw.name: Choose File
kw.doc: Inputs the ``file_path`` into the file input field ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: uploading CSV file on UI page

test.name: TC_2: validate Upload CSV file and Refresh Tax Relief Table Text from UI

kw.name: Navigate to Oppenheimer Project
kw.doc: Navigate to the Oppenheimer Project page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class='input-group-text']' contains exact text 'Upload CSV file'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@class='btn btn-primary']' contains exact text 'Refresh Tax Relief Table'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: uploading CSV file on UI page

test.name: TC_1: Fetch the details of taxRelief for each person in the database using GET API

kw.name: Make a GET API Request with
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Custom Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Custom Authenticated Session using : alias=API_GET, url=http://localhost:8080/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get Request
kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:8080//calculator/taxRelief path_url=//calculator/taxRelief headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Log Many
kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Get Dictionary Keys
kw.doc: Returns keys of the given ``dictionary`` as a list.

kw.name: Lists Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if given lists are unequal.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case run the Get api and returns a list consist of natid, tax relief amount.
